pr_title: Fix the bug that cookie of the dashboard may have conflict with web applications under the same domain

timeline.bodyText:
Using placeholders, the default value is sentinel, and we can change it
by VM argument -DSENTINEL_COOKIE_NAME=xxx.
Now the argument name SENTINEL_COOKIE_NAME is uppercase, since others such asauth.username and auth.password.. are lower case with dot separate, they are not unified.
It seems that only use sentinel or sentinel_cookie、sentinel_dashboard_cookie is enough, since we can change it by -Dserver.servlet.session.cookie.name=xxx.
timeline.author: cdfive
